title: OnePlus Nord Buds 2r True Wireless in Ear Earbuds with Mic, 12.4mm Drivers, Playback:Upto 38hr case,4-Mic Design, IP55 Rating [Deep Grey]
features: [Enhanced Sound Experience]: The buds comes with 12.4mm driver unit, which delivers crisp clear and enhanced bass quality sound experience

[Sound Master Equalizers]: For the OnePlus Nord Buds 2r, you get to choose how heavy or light you want your sound with the help of sound master equalizer s 3 unique audio profiles -Bold, Bass & Balanced
[Battery Life]:The flagship-level battery life for the all-new OnePlus Nord Buds 2r delivers up to 38 hrs of non-stop music on a single charge.; [IP55 rating]: IP55 Water & Sweat Resistance

[Gaming Mode]: It allows users to access a plethora of features while playing supported games on a OnePlus handset. They can be accessed at any time while playing games and give players the option to toggle different features and settings
Battery Average Life: 38.0 Hours; Model: E510a

reviews_from_page.title: Marvellous , awe inspiring , built like steel , GO FOR IT..!!!
reviews_from_page.text: Alright everyone , please read this review carefully as it's 6 july 2025 today and on the 23rd of August 2025 , i will have spent 2 years using these awesome and marvellous earbuds... These have been 2 years of extreme , rigorous and very very careless usage and these earphones are still in prime condition, needless to add I'm an avid consumer of music ,l wear my earbuds almost all day long , I've worn them in the gym , while running , they've seen a lot of sweat , a lot of earwax , most of the days ,i fall asleep while wearing them and get up with them either under them or on the floor, I've been very very merciless with these earbuds , I have not used them ,I have exploited them, after allll of this ,  they're still in prime condition, the mic on these works extremely well, they charge pretty quickly , the box takes a little longer to get fully charged but it lasts for a long time , call quality, voice quality , everything is awesome , their response to your touch is also very durable and awesome , it happens ever so oftent that I'm in the gym and my phone is drenched in sweat and it's screen starts malfunctioning and as a result I can't take calls , but thanks to these earphones , even after all the sweat and moisture they respond to my touch instantly amd I'm able to take calls , in the gym, while driving, 2 wheelers , 4 wheelers , everything...you know I lost their charging box somewhere , so I purchased another set of the same earphones just for the box and im still using the old earbuds with the new box , I have dropped them quite roughly several times , one or two times I have thrown them away because I was angry due to some reason and they're still going one without an ounce of reduction in quality ,  this is why I'm calling them marvellous... After such rough and extreme usage , i just can't find any big noticable flaw in them.... But yes , I'll like to add that everything depreciates with time , after 2 years of usage , their batter life isn't as good as when they were new , but the sound quality ,the durability, it's still 90% of how it was when they were new...There may be some people who are extra extra critical and would say they give 4.6 to music , 3. Blah blah blah to sound , to bass , don't bother listening to nerds and wannabe tech gurus , go for it , best in class , marvel of engineering , this is gonna be one of those few purchases that youre gonna be proud of , over and out... Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Kartik dadlani

reviews_from_page.title: Perfect earbuds but wind noise during calls are troublesome
reviews_from_page.text: I would have given 5 stars but the only issue I am facing is they are not filtering the wind noise during a call. May be a software update can resolve it. Otherwise, One plus nord 3r earbuds are perfect in sound output, good bass, battery backup is amazing in this price range. The earbuds are comfortable in ears and also filters background noise during calls but only issue is not handling wind noise. Read more
reviews_from_page.author: rajan dhawan

reviews_from_page.title: A very good basic tws.
reviews_from_page.text: Reviewing after 1 year of purchase and usage. Under this price this is the best basic tws available, which is durable and with no issues like in other companies' similar range products(boat, realme, noise, etc etc), such as the case battery doesn't charge or the ear pods don't charge or the pin doesn't connect. I have seen other people around me with other tws, failing after 1year or within 1 year. Just one issue, with several connected devices around, the pods sometimes don't connect. Solution is to put the pods in the case and plug it to the charger once for few seconds. It gets recalibrated. I didn't drop the ear pods much, maybe once or twice. And always charge with a normal charger, not a fast charger. It takes at around 2 hours, but even with 2-3+ hours of calls/playback everyday, it goes 5days - 1 week with 1 charge. And I use it daily. Can also be used as single ear pods, but the microphone quality drops, understandingly. The fit is fine. Won't drop off easily. The touch controls does what they are supposed to. I keep it very basic, just forward/stop/stop/answer/cut calls. Within these, it works fine. Within this price range, ( 1600 ) the sound is very decent and as expected. It won't blow your mind, but you won't feel any difference in your day to day usage. Range is also decent. No ANC. Was not looking for one. Overall, very good basic tws. ğŸ‘ğŸ½ Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Arka D.

reviews_from_page.title: The Budget Battery Beast with quality sound output.
reviews_from_page.text: One of the most striking aspects of the Nord Buds 3r is the design and build quality, especially the premium matte finish. This choice of material lends a sleek, non-glossy, and sophisticated feel that elevates the earbuds well beyond their price tag. For the price, the sound quality is genuinely impressive. The sound profile is distinctly bass-heavy. However, it's worth noting that at higher volume levels, the sound fidelity can suffer, the punchiness can give way to distortion, making it difficult to feel all the beats clearly. The battery performance is nothing short of amazing. The capacity of both the buds and the charging case allows for near week-long usage without needing to search for an outlets. Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Pravin

reviews_from_page.title: One month review - Good product
reviews_from_page.text: So here's my review after using it for a month: Sound quality is good. It fits comfortably and can be used during physical exercise. Excellent battery life atleast for now. I charge once for two weeks after using daily for 2 hours. Also no connectivity issues faced. Very durable. The features to control settings of earphones with heymelody app is nice. If only they could allow us tonset long press for voice assistant it would be perfect. But during a call it's difficult for people listening to you to hear clearly, especially in crowded places. It might be good enough if you speak loudly but that's weird in public. So I think microphone can be improved. Overall a great product for 1.4k. Also the sticker they sent was nice. Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Pradeep J

title: Atom 10Kg Kitchen Weight Machine 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Digital Scale with LCD Display, Scale for Home Baking, Cooking & Balance Diet. Machine with capacity 10Kg, SF400/A121,Color May Vary
features: High-Precision Sensors: Equipped with advanced sensors for quick and accurate measurements, this kitchen scale ensures precise results to make your healthy recipes deliciously perfect.
Versatile Measurement Range: Measures in grams/oz with a broad range of 1 - 10000 g, accommodating a wide variety of ingredients for all your culinary needs.

TARE Functionality: Easily calculate the net weight of ingredients by subtracting empty bowl or the container weight. Touch the TARE button to reset the scale back to zero and weigh ingredients by adding it in to the same container.
10 KG WEIGHT CAPACITY: Unlike other kitchen weight machines which have maximum 10 kg capacity, Atom kitchen scales have capacity between 2/3 gm to 10 kgs.

VERSATILE & MULTIFUNCTIONAL WEIGHING MACHINE: Whether you're measuring portions for a diet, tracking calories, or prepping meals, this weighing scale for kitchen is your go-to weight machine for food and all other kitchen tasks.

PERFECT FOR HOME & BAKING USE: This kitchen scale for home is not just for casual cooking but also for Baking use, offering precise measurements for any ingredient, whether youâ€™re weighing vegetables or managing your diet with a food calories weighing scale.
IMPORTANT NOTE: THIS IS PERSONAL USE SCALE FOR DOMESTIC USE ONLY. IT CANNOT BE USED FOR ANY COMMERCIAL, TRANSACTION OR PROTECTION PURPOSE.

reviews_from_page.title: â­â­â­â­â­ Accurate, Easy to Use, and Great Value!
reviews_from_page.text: Iâ€™ve been using this ATOM Chefmaster kitchen scale for a few days now, and Iâ€™m genuinely impressed with its accuracy and build quality. The readings are consistent and precise â€” perfect for measuring ingredients while cooking or tracking food for fitness. The design is clean and compact, and the digital display is bright and easy to read. I really like the tare function, which lets me zero out containers instantly. It even came with 2 AA batteries included, so it was ready to use right out of the box. The build feels sturdy, and the surface is easy to clean. Itâ€™s lightweight but doesnâ€™t feel cheap. Overall, itâ€™s an excellent choice if youâ€™re looking for a reliable, no-fuss kitchen scale that delivers professional-level accuracy at a budget price. Highly recommended for anyone who cooks or tracks their diet seriously! Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Goutham K

reviews_from_page.title: Accurate and Well-Built Kitchen Scale â€” Letâ€™s See How It Holds Up Over Time
reviews_from_page.text: I've been using this Atom kitchen scale for a while now, and so far, itâ€™s doing its job really well. The build quality feels solid for the priceâ€”lightweight but not flimsy. The buttons are responsive, and the display is bright and easy to read, even in daylight. In terms of accuracy, itâ€™s quite reliable. I tested it with small items like a pen and some kitchen ingredients, and the readings were consistent. The tare function works smoothly too. Overall, itâ€™s a good value for everyday use, but the real test will be how it performs after a year of regular use. If it keeps its accuracy and durability over time, itâ€™ll definitely be worth recommending. Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Sheffali thakur

reviews_from_page.title: It's cheap, and it does the job. It's worth your money.
reviews_from_page.text: Affordable, accurate, easy to use. The best investment you'll make of your care about counting calories and watching your weight, and certainly works for just making sure you got the amounts of ingredients right. FYI, It starts counting from 3 grams and above. Anything less than three grams won't be detected. Read more

reviews_from_page.title: Accurate and Well-Built Kitchen Scale â€” Letâ€™s See How It Holds Up Over Time
reviews_from_page.text: I've been using this Atom kitchen scale for a while now, and so far, itâ€™s doing its job really well. The build quality feels solid for the priceâ€”lightweight but not flimsy. The buttons are responsive, and the display is bright and easy to read, even in daylight. In terms of accuracy, itâ€™s quite reliable. I tested it with small items like a pen and some kitchen ingredients, and the readings were consistent. The tare function works smoothly too. Overall, itâ€™s a good value for everyday use, but the real test will be how it performs after a year of regular use. If it keeps its accuracy and durability over time, itâ€™ll definitely be worth recommending. Read more
reviews_from_page.author: Sheffali thakur

reviews_from_page.title: It's cheap, and it does the job. It's worth your money.
reviews_from_page.text: Affordable, accurate, easy to use. The best investment you'll make of your care about counting calories and watching your weight, and certainly works for just making sure you got the amounts of ingredients right. FYI, It starts counting from 3 grams and above. Anything less than three grams won't be detected. Read more

title: Atom 10Kg Kitchen Weight Machine 6 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Digital Scale with LCD Display, Scale for Home Baking, Cooking & Balance Diet. Machine with capacity 10Kg, SF400/A121,Color May Vary
features: High-Precision Sensors: Equipped with advanced sensors for quick and accurate measurements, this kitchen scale ensures precise results to make your healthy recipes deliciously perfect.
Versatile Measurement Range: Measures in grams/oz with a broad range of 1 - 10000 g, accommodating a wide variety of ingredients for all your culinary needs.

TARE Functionality: Easily calculate the net weight of ingredients by subtracting empty bowl or the container weight. Touch the TARE button to reset the scale back to zero and weigh ingredients by adding it in to the same container.
10 KG WEIGHT CAPACITY: Unlike other kitchen weight machines which have maximum 10 kg capacity, Atom kitchen scales have capacity between 2/3 gm to 10 kgs.

VERSATILE & MULTIFUNCTIONAL WEIGHING MACHINE: Whether you're measuring portions for a diet, tracking calories, or prepping meals, this weighing scale for kitchen is your go-to weight machine for food and all other kitchen tasks.

PERFECT FOR HOME & BAKING USE: This kitchen scale for home is not just for casual cooking but also for Baking use, offering precise measurements for any ingredient, whether youâ€™re weighing vegetables or managing your diet with a food calories weighing scale.
IMPORTANT NOTE: THIS IS PERSONAL USE SCALE FOR DOMESTIC USE ONLY. IT CANNOT BE USED FOR ANY COMMERCIAL, TRANSACTION OR PROTECTION PURPOSE.
description: High-Precision Sensors: Equipped with advanced sensors for quick and accurate measurements, this kitchen scale ensures precise results to make your healthy recipes deliciously perfect. Versatile Measurement Range: Measures in grams/oz with a broad range of 1 - 10000 g, accommodating a wide variety of ingredients for all your culinary needs. TARE Functionality: Easily calculate the net weight of ingredients by subtracting empty bowl or the container weight. Touch the TARE button to reset the scale back to zero and weigh ingredients by adding it in to the same container.
